pitch1: For 10 years, I have been designing and developing modern, fast and accessible web applications.
pitch2: As a fullstack web developper, I master front-end and back-end development, as well as database management systems. I also have some skills in graphic design and devops.
pitch3: I chose to use my skills for a cause close to my heart, and am currently web developper at Energies Demain. As a web project leader, I work on tools to help local authorities to carry out their ecological transition.
